message.entry: The following random number generator algorithms are available:
SIMD-oriented Fast Mersenne Twister with Mersenne prime 2^19937-1
Multiplicative congruential generator, with multiplier 7^5, modulo 2^31-1
Multiplicative lagged Fibonacci generator, with lags 63 and 31, 64 bit (supports parallel streams)
Combined multiple recursive generator (supports parallel streams)
Philox 4x32 generator with 10 rounds (supports parallel streams)
SHR3 shift-register generator summed with CONG linear congruential generator
Modified Subtract-with-Borrow generator, with lags 27 and 12
Threefry 4x64 generator with 20 rounds (supports parallel streams)
